{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.arrisi.com/products/product.asp?id=1072 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Arris_TM802G |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Arris |model = TM802 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = G |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = cable modem, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Puma;DNCE2510; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv6 |cpu1_type_rev = ARMv6TEJ |cpu1spd = <!-- 400 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1119R;88E1119R-NNW2, QBX9111.5UW, 1312 A0P, TW; |cm_down_c = 8 |cm_up_c = 4 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1D:D1, E8:3E:FC
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.2.1.62;PSPU-Boot; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 115-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_conn = C7P
|serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, J1,, |jtag = probably,, internal,, 10-pin header,, P801,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.0,Coax F-connector, |addchip = <!-- VoIP chip;Legerity;Le88101DVC;Le88101DVC, J A G, 1318MAX; (C) 2010;1; ,,, VoIP chip;Legerity;Le88102K0C;88102K0C, J A G, 1314MAT, MALAYSIA;1; ,,, 2A, 23V, 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8294A;;2; ,,, CoolSET-F3 SMPS Current Mode Controller;Infineon;ICE3A1065ELJ;3A1065ELJ, H1320L2B, XK332059X01;1; --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.100.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== TM802 supports :DOCSIS 3.0 compliant :PacketCable 1.0 and 1.5 compliant :PacketCable 2.0 BASIC compliant :Flexible 8x4 downstream/upstream channel-bonding :Backwards compatible with DOCSIS 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0
==Links of Interest== *[http://arris.force.com/consumers/articles/User_Guide/TM802-User-Guide User's Guide] *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/arris-touchstone-tm802g-docsis-30-8x4-ultra-high-1618 On '''SpeedGuide.net''']
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== There's a serial header @ '''J1'''. <pre> (GND) (RxD) (TxD) [3.3] J1
to tuner
